      • setupAnimation

        public void setupAnimation(float animationTime,
                           float[] beginPos,
                           float[] endPos,
                           Quaternionf beginQuaternion,
                           Quaternionf endQuaternion)
        Parameters:
        animationTime - - animation in seconds
        beginPos - - beginning viewpoint x, y, z position
        endPos - - ending viewpoint x, y, z position
        beginQuaternion - - begining rotation as a quaternion
        endQuaternion - - ending rotation as a quaternion
